name: Dead Messenger
flavor_text: A gift for the empress who has everything.

frame.name: Trinary Vision
frame.description: One-shot handheld Grenade Launcher. Projectiles release a fan of three energy waves on contact with the ground.

perks.description:
This weapon's barrel provides faster projectiles and much faster aiming.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Increases projectile speed
perks.name: Quick Launch

perks.description:
This weapon's projectiles are particularly light and quick.
  •  Increases projectile speed
  •  Increases reload speed
perks.name: High-Velocity Rounds

perks.description: [Alternate Weapon Action]  : Change this weapon's damage type, cycling between Solar, Arc, and Void.
perks.name: The Fundamentals

perks.description:
This weapon is especially easy to grip.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
perks.name: Short-Action Stock
